FuncDef: The display ospfv3 topology verbose command displays information about the detailed information of the topology in an OSPFv3 area. The display ospfv3 topology verbose command displays information about the detailed information of the topology in an OSPFv3 area. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a process ID of OSPFv3.
The value ranges from 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies the OSPF area ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 4294967295.

Specifies the OSPF area ID.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.
